title: Pixel 3a crashes, swipe down menu not available.
content: Pixel 3a from my daughter freezes up daily, side button does not work anymore, fingerprint login works at that time (not always), and when screen comes on, the pull down menu and notification bar is not available, and the background picture is not there. Restarting fixes everything. Happens way too often. Videos of issue available but apparently you can only add pictures here...
